data.name: NoOptionsSet
data.value:
There is no options set for this work schedule.
Please provide the options.

data.name: ShiftsDateNotInSpecifiedYear
data.value:
One or more shift dates are not in the header specified year '{0}'.
Please review the following date: '{1}'.

data.name: ShiftsDateNotInSpecifiedMonth
data.value:
One or more shift dates are not in the header specified month '{0}'.
Please review the following date: '{1}'.

data.name: ShiftDurationNegativeOrZero
data.value:
Shift duration can't be negative or zero.
Details: {0}.

data.name: WorTypeGapValidationNotSupported
data.value: Only the operator work type currently supports gap validation.

data.name: PreviousShiftMissingEndContinuationMarker
data.value:
A required 'end' continuation marker is missing for the employee '{0}' on '{1}'.
This marker is needed because the shift on '{2}' for the same employee starts with a continuation marker.
Please review the following dates: '{2}' and '{1}'.

data.name: PreviousShiftMultipleEndContinuationMarkerFound
data.value:
Multiple end continuation markers were found for employee '{0}' on '{1}'.
Please review the following dates: '{2}' and '{1}'.

data.name: ShiftOverlapDetected
data.value:
There is an overlap in shifts on '{0}'.
Details: - Previous Shift: Employee '{1}' from '{2}' to '{3}' - Next Shift: Employee '{4}' from '{5}' to '{6}'
Please review the timings for overlapping shifts.

data.name: ShiftGapDetected
data.value:
A gap was detected between shifts on '{0}'.
Details: - Previous Shift: Employee '{1}' from '{2}' to '{3}' - Next Shift: Employee '{4}' from '{5}' to '{6}' - Gap: '{7}'
Please ensure that no gaps exist between shifts.

data.name: ShiftMissingRequiredDays
data.value: Shift data is missing for the following days: [{0}].

data.name: ShiftExceedsMaxDurationPerEmployeePerDay
data.value:
Employee '{0}' logged '{1}' time, which exceeds the maximum allowed limit of '{2}'.
Please review the following date: '{3}'.

data.name: ShiftExceedsMaxDurationCombinedPerDay
data.value:
The combined total shift time '{0}' exceeded the allowed maximum of '{1}'.
Please review the following date: '{2}'.
